Translations.Text: Wadde ekisiikirize tekyenkana na ppereketya wa musana
Era abalamu n'abafu tebenkana, mazima Katonda awuliza oyo gwaba ayagadde era ggwe (Muhammad) tosobbola kuwuliza abo abali mu kabbuli
Mazima ffe twakutuma mu butuufu nga oli musanyusa (eri abakkiriza) era nga oli mutiisa (eri abatakkiriza) era tewali bantu bonna okugyako nga omutiisa yabatuukamu
Naye bwe bakulimbisa mazima n'abo abaabakulembera baalimbisa ababaka baabwe baabajjira n’obunnyonnyofu n'ebiwandiiko n'ebitabo ebitangaaza
Oluvanyuma nnakwata abo abaakaafuwala kale okubonereza kwange kwali kutya
Abaffe tolaba nti Katonda assa amazzi okuva waggulu netumeza nago ebibala eby'amabala ag'enjawulo nga ne mu nsozi mulimu amakubo ameeru n'amamyufu nga amabala gaago maawukamu na'maddugavu ttibittibi
Mu ngeri y'emu ne mu bantu n'ensolo n’ebisolo ebirundibwa awaka amabala gaabyo ga njawulo mazima ddala abamanyi be batya Katonda mu baddube, mazima Katonda ye nantakubwa ku mukono omusonyiyi ennyo
Mazima abo abasoma ekitabo kya Katonda (Kur’ani) ne bayimirizaawo e sswala era ne bawaayo mu kyama ne mu lwatu ku ebyo bye tubagabirira basuubira eby'obusuubuzi ebitadiba
Ate alyoke abawe mu bujjuvu empeera zaabwe era abongeze mu birungibye anti mazima yye, musonyiyi nnyo omwebaza
